verses.verse: <S%H8085>"Hear,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel!<s%> You are <S%H5674>crossing<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> you, <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H1219>fortified<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%>

a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7311>tall,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6062>Anakim,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> and of <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H8085>heard<s%> [it said], <S%H4310>'Who<s%> can <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>?'

<S%H3045>"Know<s%> therefore <S%H3117>today<s%> that it is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> who is <S%H5674>crossing<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you as a <S%H398>consuming<s%> <S%H784>fire.<s%> He will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them and He will <S%H3665>subdue<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> you, so that you may <S%H3423>drive<s%> them out and destroy them <S%H6>quickly,<s%> <S%H4118>just<s%> as the <S%H9201>Lord<s%> has <S%H3068>spoken<s%> to you.

"Do not <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%> when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1920>driven<s%> them out <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, 'Because of my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H935>brought<s%> me in to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> 'but [it is] because of the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> [that] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H3423>dispossessing<s%> them <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.

"It is not for your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> or for the <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart<s%> that you are <S%H935>going<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H776>land,<s%> but [it is] <S%H3588>because<s%> of the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> [that] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H3423>driving<s%> them out <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H6965>confirm<s%> the <S%H1697>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your fathers, to <S%H1>Abraham,<s%> <S%H85>Isaac<s%> and <S%H3327>Jacob.<s%>

<S%H3045>"Know,<s%> then, [it is] not because of your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> [that] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3423>possess,<s%> for you are a <S%H7186>stubborn<s%> <S%H6203><s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H2142>"Remember,<s%> do not <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H854>how<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H7107>provoked<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H7107>wrath<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you <S%H3318>left<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H935>arrived<s%> at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> you have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Even at <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> you <S%H7107>provoked<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H7107>wrath,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was so <S%H599>angry<s%> with you that He would have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> you.

"When I <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H3772>made<s%> with you, then I <S%H3427>remained<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H3915>nights;<s%> I <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> me the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> by the <S%H676>finger<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> and on them [were] <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> with you at the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>

"And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H3915>nights<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> me the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

"Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H6965>'Arise,<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H2088>here<s%> <S%H4118>quickly,<s%> for your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H3318>brought<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> have <S%H7843>acted<s%> <S%H7843>corruptly.<s%> They have <S%H4118>quickly<s%> <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them; they have <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H4541>image<s%> for themselves.'

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> further to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H2009>indeed,<s%> it is a <S%H7186>stubborn<s%> <S%H6203><s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H7503>'Let<s%> Me <S%H4480>alone,<s%> <S%H7503><s%> that I may <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them and <S%H4229>blot<s%> out their <S%H8034>name<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> of you a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6099>mightier<s%> and <S%H7227>greater<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> they.'

"So I <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> while the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> was <S%H1197>burning<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> were in my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

"And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that you had <S%H2009>indeed<s%> <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> You had <S%H6213>made<s%> for yourselves a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf;<s%> you had <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.

"And I <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H8610>hold<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> and <S%H7993>threw<s%> them from my <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H7665>smashed<s%> them before your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

"And I <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> as at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H3915>nights;<s%> I <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you had <S%H2398>committed<s%> in <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H7451>what<s%> was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H3707>provoke<s%> Him to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

"For I was <S%H3025>afraid<s%> of the <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H2534>hot<s%> <S%H2534>displeasure<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H7107>wrathful<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you in order to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> you, but the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to me that <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H1571>also.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> <S%H3966>enough<s%> with <S%H175>Aaron<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> him; so I <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> at the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H6256>time.<s%>

"And I <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H9128>sinful<s%> [thing], the <S%H5695>calf<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you had <S%H6213>made,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> it with <S%H784>fire<s%> and <S%H3807>crushed<s%> it, <S%H2912>grinding<s%> it <S%H3190>very<s%> <S%H3190>small<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> it was as <S%H1854>fine<s%> as <S%H6083>dust;<s%> and I <S%H7993>threw<s%> its <S%H6083>dust<s%> into the <S%H5158>brook<s%> that <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>
"Again at <S%H8404>Taberah<s%> and at <S%H4532>Massah<s%> and at Kibroth-hattaavah you <S%H7107>provoked<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H7107>wrath.<s%>

"And when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> you from Kadesh-barnea, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5927>'Go<s%> up and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you, 'then you <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> you <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H539>believed<s%> Him <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to His <S%H6963>voice.<s%>
"You have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> I <S%H3045>knew<s%> you.

"So I <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> the <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H3915>nights,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5307>did<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> He would <S%H8045>destroy<s%> you.

"And I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> 'O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> do not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> even Thine <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> through Thy <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%H3318>brought<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H2142>'Remember<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> do not <S%H6437>look<s%> at the <S%H7190>stubbornness<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> or at their <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> or their <S%H9128>sin.<s%>

<S%H6435>'Otherwise<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H834>which<s%> Thou didst <S%H3318>bring<s%> us may <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4480>"Because<s%> <S%H1097><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H1696>promised<s%> them and <S%H4480>because<s%> He <S%H8135>hated<s%> them He has <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out to <S%H4191>slay<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>"

'Yet they are Thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> even Thine <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%H3318>brought<s%> out by Thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and Thine <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm.<s%>'
